value.title: Is Artificial Intelligence relevant to Insurance?
value.excerpt:
Discover the benefits and challenges the insurance industry is facing with the growing use of artificial intelligence (AI).
The post Is Artificial Intelligence relevant to Insurance? appeared first on IBM Blog.

value.title: Three Trends Of Transformation: How AI & Value-Based Care (VBC) Will Drive Transformation Of Self-Insured Healthcare
value.excerpt: Healthcare is on the brink of a seismic shift, and AI is its catalyst. (1) Large Language Models extend our predictive capabilities. (2) Self-insured companies' risk profile and the patient needs are aligned.

value.title: New Machine Learning tool by IIT Madras to detect brain, spinal cord tumour
value.excerpt: Madras have developed a Machine Learning (ML)-based computational tool for better detection of cancer-causing tumours in the brain and spinal cord

value.title: Scientist noted dangers of AI in book published shortly after his death
value.excerpt: British theoretical physicist Stephen Hawking warned of the dangers associated with artificial intelligence before his death in 2018, arguing it could end the human race.

value.title: Indian job market to grow 22 pc in 5 yrs; AI, machine learning among top roles: WEF
value.excerpt: Top roles for industry transformation in India would be AI (artificial intelligence) and machine learning specialists, and data analysts and scientists, the report added.

value.title: AI-generated music growing exponentially, sparking debate
value.excerpt: An anonymous creator used artificial intelligence to create a song with Drake and The Weeknd’s voices, fueling AI’s first real viral hit, “Heart on my Sleeve.” NBC News’ Steve Patterson gets a closer look at how AI music is created.

value.title: Board Directors And C-Suite Executives Need An AI Digital Literacy Jolt
value.excerpt: This article summarizes a series of articles on ChatGPT to help advance board directors and c-level leaders understanding of AI in particular, generative AI like OpenAI's ChatGPT.

value.title: How Does HIV Drug Help Protect Against Build-Up of Dementia?
value.excerpt: Scientists have also discovered HIV medication that restores this vital function. The findings are published in Neuron. A common characteristic of neurodegenerative diseases such as Huntington's disease and various forms of dementia is the build-up in the brain of clusters - known as aggregates - of misfolded proteins,

value.title: AI Ethicist Views On ChatGPT
value.excerpt: Physicist Stephen Hawking, who died in 2018, described the rise of AI as one of the greatest threats to the future of humanity. Even the controversial Elon Musk and over 1000 technology leaders have called for a pause on generative AI and for advancing legislation.

value.title: How Are Educators Reacting To Chat GPT?
value.excerpt: ChatGPT has the opportunity to innovate how education is accessed, as well as could have severe consequences on student’s critical thinking skill development This blog will explore some of the views,

value.title: AI Email Spam Is Headed This Way…And Other SMB Tech News This Week
value.excerpt: Plus: Google makes new changes to its workplace platform and Yelp adds new capabilities to help consumers do better reviews.

value.title: 4 tech giants mentioned AI a total of 168 times on earnings calls, showing just how much attention the tech is attracting
value.excerpt: Alphabet cited artificial intelligence the most often on its investor call last week, followed by Microsoft, Meta, and Amazon.

value.title: Promises, Perils, And Predictions For Artificial Intelligence In Medicine: A Radiologist’s Perspective
value.excerpt: In my own field of radiology, AI will be used to enhance (but not yet replace) human radiologists making diagnoses from medical images. There are already FDA-approved AI algorithms to detect subtle internal bleeding within the brain or potentially fatal blood clots (“pulmonary embolism”) within the arteries of the lung.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence May Amplify Bias, But Fights It As Well
value.excerpt: AI bias actually lies in the real world, human society, or the system that can be exposed through the use of AI.'

value.title: Saturday Conversation: Herbie Hancock On International Jazz Day, What Jazz Means To Him, AI And More
value.excerpt: Herbie Hancock is celebrating International Jazz Day (tomorrow, April 30), with an all-star live stream featuring some of the best jazz artists performing all over the world. Hancock agreed to speak about his love of jazz,

value.title: This AI Startup is Building Better Tools Than AWS Sagemaker and Google AutoML
value.excerpt: Nirman Dave, CEO at Obviously AI claimed that their models are better than those of AWS Sagemaker or Google AutoML.

value.title: Artificial intelligence changing politics with fake images and videos
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence is adding a new dimension to the political universe. NBC News’ Hallie Jackson reports on the danger of disinformation that could come along with the tech, showing us how easily AI can be used to make fake videos or images.

value.title: Report describes Apple’s “organizational dysfunction” and “lack of ambition” in AI
value.excerpt: A new behind-the-scenes report in The Information details Apple's struggles to keep up with AI features and innovation amid the rise of large language models (LLMs) that drive groundbreaking tools like ChatGPT.

value.title: Forget AI; Organoid Intelligence May Soon Power Our Computers
value.excerpt: While the world has been captivated by artificial intelligence, researchers at Johns Hopkins University have identified a new form of intelligence: organoid intelligence. A future where computers are powered by lab-grown brain cells may be closer than we could ever have imagined.

value.title: Carmakers Emphasize Practicality In New Goals For Autonomous Driving
value.excerpt: In Pittsburgh and in auto-industry development centers in Detroit, Tokyo, Frankfurt and Silicon Valley, automakers’ expectations for and demands on self-driving technology have gotten a lot more modest in one sense — and stronger in another.

value.title: AI In Healthcare: What’s To Be Done About Data?
value.excerpt: The widespread deployment of AI in U.S. healthcare will succeed only with the establishment of a national infrastructure for open health data.

value.title: AI startup Synthesia made waves this week on both sides of deepfake debate
value.excerpt: Two articles this week highlighted the complex debate around the companies creating deepfakes, or synthetic media.

value.title: Unicef And Partners Using Artificial Intelligence To Fight Dengue
value.excerpt: As the climate changes, mosquito-borne diseases are on the rise. Members of UNICEF's Innovation and Climate teams are working with partners to create AI models that can predict and prevent future outbreaks.

value.title: RSA Conference 2023 Ushers In The Age Of Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: Vice President, Security, Carriers and Enterprise Networking, Will Townsend, shares his insights into what he found most compelling at RSA Conference 2023.
